lead_paragraph: The British rider Geraint Thomas took the overall lead in the Paris-Nice race by finishing the mountainous sixth stage in second place behind the Russian Ilnur Zakarin.

headline.main: Geraint Thomas Has Narrow Lead in Paris-Nice Race

snippet: The British rider Geraint Thomas took the overall lead in the Paris-Nice race by finishing the mountainous sixth stage in second place behind the Russian Ilnur Zakarin.
abstract: Cyclist IInur Zakarin wins sixth stage of Paris-Nice race as Geraint Thomas takes overall lead.
